def get_clipboard_logs():
    conn = sqlite3.connect(DB_FILE)
    c = conn.cursor()
    c.execute(
        "SELECT timestamp, username, ip, text, 'clipboard' as type FROM clipboard_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC"
    )
    logs = c.fetchall()
    conn.close()
    return [
        {
            "timestamp": row[0],
            "username": row[1],
            "ip": row[2],
            "text": row[3],
            "type": row[4],
        }
        for row in logs
    ]


def get_screenshot_logs():
    conn = get_db()
    c = conn.cursor()
    c.execute(
        "SELECT timestamp, username, ip, text, type, image_path FROM screenshot_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC"
    )
    logs = c.fetchall()
    return logs
get_screenshot_logs_from_db
